controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program cover customers who act as partners in partnerships?
Does your AML/CTF program include risk-based systems and controls to verify that the partnership exists and that all partners' names have been provided?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based systems and controls for partnership existence verification and partner identification.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to collect the full name of the partnership?
controls.detail-label: Describe the procedure for collecting the partnership's full name.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to collect the full business name (if registered) of the partnership under State or Territory business names legislation?
controls.detail-label: Describe the procedure for collecting the registered business name.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to collect the country in which the partnership was established?
controls.detail-label: Describe the procedure for collecting the partnership's country of establishment.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to collect individual customer identification information (name, date of birth, address, etc.) from at least one partner?
controls.detail-label: Describe the procedure for collecting individual identification information from partners, including reference to your individual identification procedure.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to collect the full name and residential address of each partner in the partnership (or confirm professional association membership)?
controls.detail-label: Describe the procedure for collecting partner names and addresses, or how you confirm regulated status through professional association directories.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include risk-based systems and controls to determine whether additional KYC information beyond the minimum should be collected about the partnership?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based assessment process for determining whether to collect additional information about partnerships.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to verify the full name of the partnership using partnership agreements, certified documents, or reliable independent sources?
controls.detail-label: Describe the procedure and documentary sources used to verify the partnership's full name.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include a procedure to verify individual customer identification information from at least one partner in accordance with your individual identification procedure?
controls.detail-label: Describe the procedure for verifying individual partner identification and reference your individual identification verification procedure.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include risk-based systems and controls to determine whether additional collected KYC information about the partnership should be verified?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based process for determining the extent of verification required for additional partnership information.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program permit verification of partnership information using partnership agreements or certified copies/extracts?
Does your AML/CTF program permit verification of partnership information using certified copies/extracts of partnership meeting minutes?
Does your AML/CTF program permit verification of partnership information using reliable and independent documents relating to the partnership?
Does your AML/CTF program permit verification of partnership information using reliable and independent electronic data?
Does your AML/CTF program permit verification using a combination of partnership agreements, meeting minutes, reliable documents, and electronic data?

Does your AML/CTF program permit the use of disclosure certificates to verify partnership information when used as additional KYC procedures and when information is not otherwise reasonably available?
controls.detail-label: Describe the circumstances under which you accept disclosure certificates and how you ensure information is not otherwise available.

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include risk-based systems and controls to identify and respond to discrepancies during partnership verification?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedures for identifying discrepancies and the risk-based actions taken to resolve them and confirm partnership existence and partner identification.

groups.title: Partnership CDD Scope
groups.description: Determine whether your AML/CTF program has customers acting as partners in partnerships, and whether Part 4.5 CDD requirements apply.

groups.title: Satisfaction Requirements
groups.description: Risk-based controls to verify partnership existence and partner identification.

groups.title: Collection of KYC Information
groups.description: Procedures to collect minimum required information about partnerships and partners.

groups.title: Collection Risk Assessment
groups.description: Risk-based decision-making on whether to collect additional KYC information beyond the minimum.

groups.title: Verification of Information
groups.description: Procedures to verify partnership details and partner identity using specified sources and methods.

groups.title: Verification Risk Assessment
groups.description: Risk-based decision-making on whether to verify additional collected KYC information.

groups.title: Verification Methods
groups.description: Approved sources and methods for verifying partnership information.

groups.title: Disclosure Certificate Procedures
groups.description: Procedures for using disclosure certificates as verification evidence in specific circumstances.

groups.title: Handling Discrepancies
groups.description: Risk-based controls to respond to and resolve discrepancies discovered during verification.
